info.author: Colin Jermain, Graham Rowlands
info.description:
MuCloud runs `MuMax3`_ GPU-accelerated micromagnetic simulations on the cloud, eliminating the need to have a GPU card on your computer. With your `Amazon Web Services`_ (AWS) account, virtual computer instances are created using the `Elastic Compute Cloud`_ (EC2). These instances provide on-demand (`price per hour`_) access to physical GPU hardware, that allow the simulations to be run remotely. The script interface mimics MuMax3, so that working with MuCloud is as easy as using MuMax3 on a local computer.

.. _MuMax3: http://mumax.github.io/
.. _Amazon Web Services: http://aws.amazon.com/
.. _Elastic Compute Cloud: http://aws.amazon.com/ec2/
.. _price per hour: http://aws.amazon.com/ec2/pricing/
info.name: MuCloud
info.summary: GPU-accelerated micromagnetic simulations on remote cloud instances

The script interface mimics MuMax3, so that working with MuCloud is as easy as using MuMax3 on a local computer.
